content:
I work in the gaming industry, and while there was a push to try to find integrations for AI, the most promising usages of machine learning algorithms are in areas like anti-cheat. One engineer reported success using a GPT product to generate some code which he could then correct, but the majority of his job doesn't actually involve writing large amounts of new code so the utility is extremely limited. I don't know of any other usages of LLM across our teams.

I am extremely interested in hearing of success stories from other industries, or conversely I'd love to hear about what other experiments others have been doing.
